reviewText: It arrived really scratched. I had to really buff it in order to watch it.
I was happy to find this movie, especially in DVD.  It was in good shape as promised.  My grandson was thrilled.
dvd was as stated, in very good condition, shipping was timely. I'm pleased with this purchase

One of the best dvds in the great "Between the Lions" series.  My two year old grandson would like to play it everytime he comes over and enjoys each of the many segments. He clearly follows and often mimics the various ways the show reinforces vowel sounds ("The Vowelles" singing group), phonics and word identification.  The relationships among the lion characters is also a strong role model for family communication, affection and love of reading.
